CustomField.formula: (CASE( Commitment_Recap__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Set_the_Agenda__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Important_Abstrakt_Announcements__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( State_of_Business__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Our_Pipeline__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Introduce_your_Organization_to_KDMs__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Schedule_Date_Time_Appointments__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Build_Maintain_Relationships__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Your_Pipeline__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Sales_Consulting__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Recommendations_to_Client__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( X360_Degree_Marketing__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Talked_about_The_Grow_Show__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Lifetime_Partnership__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Recap_Commitments__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( AR__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Referrals__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Confirm_Next_Meeting_Date__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0))/36
